title: Dhanush next new movie directed by Durai Senthil Kumar of Kodi movie director - Tamil Movie News
text: Vivekh reveals Rajini and his daughter's similarities There have been reports doing the rounds that Dhanush’s new film after ‘Power Pandi’, ‘VIP2’ and ‘ENPT’ would be directed by Durai Senthil Kumar who gave the hit film ‘Kodi’. Dhanush has confirmed that it is indeed true that Durai is writing the script for him, but however he cautioned that it is too early to disclose further details.
